title: GADVASU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Field Worker Posts
description: Guru Angad Dev Veterinary and Animal Sciences University (GADVASU) has published the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Field Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Intermediate (10+2)can grab this chance and apply for the GADVASU Recruitment 2025 . Here we mention more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-...
